text: Johann David Wadephul (; born 10 February 1963) is a German politician of the Christian Democratic Union (CDU) who has been a member of the German Parliament since 2009. In 2025, he became the Minister for Foreign Affairs in the Merz government. ==References== ==Other websites== * Website of Johann David Wadephul * Johann David Wadephul at the Landtag of Schleswig-Holstein Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Foreign ministers of Germany Category:Politicians from Schleswig-Holstein Category:Politicians of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany
title: Johann Wadephul
